39448299.review:
3Dモデリンクを趣味/実益に充てている人にとって法線マップを作成出来るアプリは用意するとグラフィックツール等を使うよりも大幅に効率化が出来る。
モデラーによっては法線マップを作成出来るものも多いのだが、作成出来ないものや操作が複雑なツールの場合、外部ツールで作成する方が良い事も多い。
Steam内で競合するツールはSubstance B2M辺りなのだが、パワフルな分価格面でかなり高価なのは弱点だろうか…

無料で法線マップを作るツールも幾らかある(NormalMap-OnlineやAwesomeBumpが有名)が、
NormalMap-Onlineの場合無料だが法線マップしか作成出来ず、AwesomeBumpは強力ながらもUIが多少煩雑なので取っ付きにくいかもしれない。

で、MindTex2なのだが、単純に安価(1980円　バージョンアップ前はもう少し安価だった)という点と、取っ付き易いUIと言う点で個人的に勧めたい。
直感的な操作の出来る(日本語サポートされていないが必要ないLV)UIによってパラメーター自体余り考えず弄るだけでもどのような凹凸や光沢が付くかをシンプルに確認出来るのは気軽である…
弱点はSubstance B2MやAwesomeBump等で出来る特殊効果等は付与出来ない事…その辺りは価格的に、UI的に仕方ないだろう。

39279639.review: Использую только для карт нормалей - и с этой задачей программа отлично справляется. Есть множество опций для тонкой настройки, если автоматическая генерация не выдала подходящий результат.

38008755.review:
Very good, lightweight software that does exactly what it says on the tin. A fraction of the price of CrazyBump for the exact same package. Makes making textures from photos easy and quick!

My only wish is that MindTex allowed you to preview your displacement maps with tesselation.

36023217.review:
Très bon logiciel. Il fait ce qu'on lui demande.

C'est rapide, simple, et efficace !

La qualité des textures après avoir utilisé le logiciel sont vraiment pas mal.

Je recommande ce logiciel sans aucun souci ! :)

34909627.review:
Great software for generating texture maps, allows you to generate and customize them quickly and easily, however I have 2 issues with it
-the default file extension is .jpg, it's annoying to have to change it to a lossless format every time
-whenever I import a 2048x2048 diffuse it seems to export any maps I make in 1024x1024 upscaled to 2048x2048 unless I change the preview resolution to 2048x2048

33937377.review: Good quality and quick, even with very high resolution textures. Awesome!

33273607.review: This program is seriously a hidden gem for indie game developers. It isn't as good as some of the higher priced programs like B2M3, but for its price this is a very solid program. It is extremely simple to use and allows you to create normal maps, gloss, reflection, height, etc with ease and allows you to export the maps all at once.

32345508.review: Приятный интерфейс, хороший вьюпорт, качественно генерирует карты, экспорт без хлопот.

31482625.review:
個人的に趣味の範囲で3Dモデリングをしています。
このMindTex2は3Dツールではありませんが、3Dを作成する上で、
テクスチャーの凹凸表現を編集作成する上で便利だと思います。
原則的には、無料のPEINT.NETなどのエンボス加工を応用すれば出来ますが
もう少し丁寧に作るなら、このMindTex2は有用なのではと思います。
操作する上で日本語に対応はしていませんが、それほど難しくはありません。

31175079.review: MindTex 2 is a pretty nice software. I often use it for normal map creation. While these textures are mostly placeholders for now used only for testing but ultimately I think that MT2 generates fairly accurate images which can be used professionally too. It has options for tweaking and not only limited for normal map generation. It also displays the final mix on one of the selectable models or you can even import your own stuff and check out the result. The price might be a little bit high for something like this but in the end I am happy that I have a program like this at hand when it comes to fast texture map generation.

30860199.review: It's somewhat basic but it does the job

30615772.review: Pretty useful software. It's quick and easy to use. Genereate any kind of material maps such as Bumpmaps or Specular maps with this software.As a noob modeler it helps me a lot!

29995992.review: Really good for creating normalmaps, heightmaps, occlusion maps, etc. You can preview your maps as you edit them, and easily export as PNG or any other common format.

29858553.review: Very good software, better thatn CrazyBumb

29828555.review:
For £20.......mind blowing.....very capable piece of software and when tweaked right the final result is just as good as other similar software....

Thank you for the very modest price  !!!

29470189.review: Extremely useful tool if you know what you're doing. Sure it might not be the best in the world, but it gets the job done and is easy to use.

29003181.review:
Wow! Einfach nur Wow!

Ich kenne keine einfachere Methode, um aus einer beliebigen Textur, alle Maps automatisch generieren zu lassen. Die Ergebnisse lassen sich auch sehr gut anschauen. Für 3D-Modellierer unabdingbar. Sehr gutes Tool!

28833808.review: Одно слово СУПЕР! Отличная программа, работает быстро, интерфейс проще пареной репы при этом функционал очень хороший. Программа позволяет создавать normal map, AO, карты высот, карты отражений, бликов и т.д. также порадовала  функция исправления швов текстур. Учитывая все выше сказанное и ценник программы, она просто обязательна для покупки всем 3D художникам и дизайнерам.

28610255.review:
The cleanest interface on a height/normal generator I've ever used.
Switch DirectX or OpenGL green channels.
Load any model for previewing.
Lots of map export file formats.
Fast.
Clean.
BUY IT.

28252676.review:
Very usefull tool. Works without any issues on my Win10 machine.

Like:
*) Save all maps with one "save" button (or just choose a single one):
Diffuse, Normal, Height, Specular, Gloss, Self. Ilum, Reflection, Amb. Occ.
*) Various export formats. For example: png, psd, tga, bmp, jpeg, tiff...
*) Various preview meshes and easy import of new preview meshes in many different formats: fbx, blender, obj, dae, lxo, ms3d, ... You could even enable a skybox and auto-rotate if you like.
*) Easy to change light angle with right-mouse and rotate the preview mesh with left-mouse
*) Batch import/export

28149565.review: Полезная программка. Печально что не очень популярная.

26546534.review:
+Preiswert (Vergleichbare Software kostet meistens deutlich mehr (z.B. CrazzyBumb ( ca.99$)))
+Viele Einstellungsmöglichkeiten
+einfach zu bedienen (nach kurzer Einarbeitungszeit )
+man kann alle Textur-maps  auf einmal speichern
+qualitativ hochwertige Resultate
+schöne Benutzeroberfläche

26414875.review:
This used to be a really handy multi-texture map generator tool for stuff like normal, ao, spec, etc that was very fast and helpful especially for game development stuff.

However, in it's current state after several tries and several workarounds I have found that recently it is not working on Windows 10 on my end though others claim it works so perhaps it is different for some people it seems.

At this point I personally cannot recommend it until the problem is fully resolved and I do not recommend buying it at least until I know and can verify it's working 100% again.

It has forced me to use Mindtex 1 which is okay but not as good nor as finetuned and also leaving me looking for other affordable or free alternatives for the time being which is extremely upsetting.

As the saying goes you get what you pay for..

I have since moved to ShaderMap which I like a lot better, it can do way more even though it is double the price but well worth the switch.

26337140.review:
Awesome. Just awesome.

The reason I love MindTex 2 so much is simply that it's convenient. The thing is, you don't have too much control over each map. There is a generic set of control values, but I feel that this is an upside in itself. If I need something very specific, then I will do it manually. For the vast majority of maps, however, you can generate a texture set within 60 seconds. I actually like the simplicity of MindTex 2.

In summary- want to generate maps without any hassle whatsoever? Use this.

26083569.review: I'm something of a Intermediate game developer. MindTex generates and Exports all Maps quickly. and it was useful while creating normal maps for Terrain textures in unity. Also the auto-seam feature was useful to create seam-less texture.  Other than that I haven't found any other use for MindTex, yet.

25771307.review: huge improvement over the original which was a mess.  a neat feature is the blending of layers which lets you get variation and seamless texture creation super quick.   to get best results you will still need good texture input and add a macro texture for variation in UNity ir Unreal but this software is damn easy and super quick.  I made two materials for UE4 in about twenty minutes thats including improting the textures and setting up material in engine.  B2M3 is better with more controls but for speed/price this is a great tool to get started with for texturing.

25667109.review: Отличная программа. Простая, функциональная и без ненужных нагромождений. Потрясающая цена, что вам ещё нужно??;)

25028073.review: Non è ovviamente ai livelli di Pixplant, ma tutto considerato,fa la sua sporca figura.

24434173.review: Looking for a nice bumpmap/normalmap generator that is easy to use and generates quality equivalent to CrazyBump, but can't afford CrazyBump's ridiculous price tag ($300)? Get this program! You will not be disappointed!

24317761.review:
Since always i generated all my different maps for my models with GIMP and the proper Plugins like BumpMap, etc. Now this little Software comes up to me, because a friend discovered it by accident. All i have to say is: Wow, this is simple, powerful and extremely intuitive.

Pros:
- Generates all types of maps out of one diffuse texture
- Generates Normal Maps
- Generates Height Maps
- Generates Specual Maps
- Generates Gloss Maps
- Generates Self Illumination Maps
- Generates Reflection Maps
- Generates Ambient Occlusion Maps
- Has a Batch-Workflow to generate multiple diffuses to mentioned maps in one pipeline
- The price is rediculously low for what this Software offers.

Cons:
- Really, i couldn't find any.

I highly recommend this Software to both, beginners and advanced people.

23922897.review: Does exactly what it says on the tin with very nice results, you don't even have to learn this program, it is that straight forward and easy to use.

23868725.review: Очень легкий и мощный инструмент для создание нормал мапов) советую!

23801577.review:
Really awesome software.
Before I knew about this software I used a website to do the Normal maps, Specular maps and more it took me a bit longer was pretty laggy especially with high res textures and I couldn't tweak so many sliders :3

So after I saw this I had to buy it and I was very surprised how awesome I could make the textures look like.
Before my textures / models for the game looked awesome but now it really is much better than before!
I can do much better  textures and this software is also good to use with high-res textures.

I would recommend it to everyone who has a bit of money left for it and want to have some awesome results for his game or whatever you're using it for.

23735681.review: Great software, creates many different style maps very easily.

23670067.review: Simply THE best program for making normals and specular maps!

23421024.review: This is the best image software I have ever used! I use it for all of my normal map needs!

23331132.review:
Does what it says it does and is a lot cheaper than the competition. I have only used trial version of that other program that is pretty much identical to this one but costs 400$ and the results seemed the same. I\'m sure that ut4 substance program has some nice convenience features and that one new type of map but really I just want good normal and depth map generation.

This program has no drm so you can just copy the folder from your steamapps to anywhere and use it without bothering with steam. (That is why I have just 1h on my account). Do have to recopy if there is an update though.

Also, just an fyi, the company that made this program gave it for free to all those that had already bought MindTex 1 so they seem like a nice bunch.

23273806.review: It would be a shame not to buy it. So useful, so cheap!

23228955.review: Quick, fast and works. What more I need

22819222.review:
Great software for good quick high quality maps and simple to use.
For low great price.

Would highly recommend it.

22545531.review:
Although it has some annoying limitations, it's seriously invaluable to me at this point, and at this price it's hard to recommend any thing else.  I'm sure some of the really high-end softwares are worth it but if you don't want to take that risk or you just can't afford it, I have very little to complain about here.

It fixes seams with reasonable efficiency, has loads of colour options for each map, allows you to paste images from the clipboard, supports multiple images to blend at once, generates very good maps, is fast, offers many shape layers on height and normal maps, often knows what to do with lighting in a photograph, and is just overall good and cheap.

My complaints?  Two:  only square textures are supported, so I have to paste my non-tiling textures into Photoshop and 'square' them with a border before using them in this software; and when you blend maps with other images you have, you can't completely control the way it blends and you have to keep the original map as your 'main' map.  Annoying, but worth the good it comes with.

22366775.review:
这款软件很棒，功能比较齐全，而且有很多其它软件没有的特色功能

其中一个特色就是可以导入模型来查看材质，以前用过的贴图软件都只能用内置的几种材质球来查看

还有灯光的明亮和色调也可以自己调整，还能使用内置的天空背景

缺点就是按钮的布局不行，像材质球和贴图类型这些常用功能的切换应该更直接一些，让用户可以快速点击而不是在下拉菜单里切换

买2代还会赠送一代哦 :)

22294247.review:
[h1]3D材質預覽加強器[/h1]

這是用來加強3D紋理圖檔的小工具，內建各種濾鏡加強材質立體感，更改光澤，可同時貼在3D模型上做預覽修正，除了內建基本模型，還可導入自己的各類3D模型，自己定義預覽光源與背景，簡單快速又直觀，可節省很多2D/3D美工上的轉換時間。

21983316.review:
OMG the Seamless texture tool alone is worth the 20$ or so for this product I got it as a free upgrade to Mindtex.

Love this software the devs did a fantastic job I recommend it to anyone who needs quick real world resaults top notch quality.

21954463.review:
This program is decent, i say decent cause it makes good normal maps and there is a reasonable amount of control to influence the normal maps, though i would like a bit more control over them. Specular and gloss maps are nice too and height maps are very good, also enough control to shape the height maps.

However, diffuse maps are totally destroyed if you compare them to the original diffuse, it is obvious due to the use of a bad codec to save the jpg file. The diffuse that gets saved is grainy and aliased and just looks bad, luckily i mostly make the secondary maps out of a perfect diffuse map, so i always have my source diffuse map, so there is no problem with the diffuse being saved bad for me.

I'd say it's not yet a professional package, although it might be considered semi-pro, it does it's job pretty well, still there is room for improvement.

Overall i like it and it's easy to work with, everything can be tweaked with a visual 3d representation, although i did not notice any change in the real time view when i tweaked the gloss maps.

I'd give it a 7 out of 10, but it sure has potential to grow into something great.

21781668.review:
First Review Ever: This is a much smoother and more improved utility. Not perfect on it's seamless generation but all in all nothing in this price range out there and certainly this is amazing that I recieved this for free because I bought the first version years ago.
-quickly generation thick and beefy normals
-pbr texture flow ready although technically no metallic/ roughness but gloss, metal, opacity, you figure it out, it's there
-if you already have seamless textures you will enjoy this program for it's ability to maximize your end material,

21685274.review: Great tool for very cheap! I wasn't disapointed at all so far.

21675576.review: So much better than the first MindTex. The UI is a lot intuitive. :) Love it!

21543365.review:
Still the best normal map generator for its price.
Loads of options for tweaking the textures, auto seam fix, real time 3d preview and much more.
Also, the 2.0 version was given for free to the owners of the previous version.
Absolutely recommended to all indie developers, 3d artists, hobbyists.

21508258.review: Great software, it generates great high quality texture maps and it has very few bugs. I highly recommend this software, especially because it's only $14.99. Which is a complete steal when compared to other similar softwares like CrazyBump which costs $100.

21388693.review:
Like MindTex 1 a great piece of software. I also used the beta for MindTex 2 a lot (hence only 15 minutes of time at this point). I can still recommend this software to anyone in need to create quick high quality normal, height, specular, reflection, gloss, self-illumination or occlusion maps. It generates these from a simple diffuse texture (preferably an albedo map for the best results). 

The biggest + however is its price which is incredibly low, especially compared to other pieces of software that essentially do the same. 

Definitely recommended!
